title: Web-Based Language Advanced Course: Structured Self-Directed Learning and Interaction Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and comprehension of job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: Course for professionals to improve work-integrated language skills, requiring flexible structure accommodating individual learning time variations

learning_goals: Learners can improve their language proficiency to B1+ level through structured modules (grammar, vocabulary, business document writing) within the LMS
Learners exchange constructive feedback at least three times after analyzing practical cases through peer interaction in weekly discussion forums
Learners achieve a score of 80 or above in job-related document translation or report writing assessments at the course completion

resources: Digital Textbooks (Interactive PDFs and Audio Files)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
